abstract.shortdesc: In this lesson, you will learn about menu selection and how to put together the menu for your PB&J meal.

taskbody.context: Menu selection is critical to the success of a meal. You might whip up the best PB&J sandwich ever, but if you serve it with orange juice instead of milk, or broccoli instead of chips and salsa, your PB&J is toast.

concept.title: About menus
concept.shortdesc: A menu is a list of the food items being served for a particular meal. Depending on the cuisine, the menu will consist of different courses. Because a PB&J meal is distinctly its own cuisine, you must be fairly cautious with your selection.

conbody.p:
A PB&J meal should include at least the following courses.
Appetizer: chips and salsa
Entree (main dish): the sandwich
Dessert: cookies Additionally, a PB&J meal should be served with a smooth, natural, creamy beverage that is noncarbonated and high in fat. Cow's milk is the obvious choice, with its flavor and texture characteristics that complement both the PB&J sandwich and the cookie dessert.

taskbody.context: Putting the menu on paper solidifies your commitment to the meal and moves you closer to the implementation phase.
